DataElement.preferredName: Concomitant Medication Domain Corticosteroid Agent Administration Dose
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The value for the dose of a steroid/corticosteroid.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Concomitant Medication Domain Corticosteroid Agent Administration
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to concomitant medication administration._Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation)._The act of the dispensing, applying, or tendering a medical product or other agent.
